actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I. The next meeting is scheduled for 12:00 p.m. on July 14, 2025.

Pursuant to 22 U.S.C. 276d and the order of the House of January 3, 2025, the Speaker appointed the following members of the House to the Canada-United States Interparliamentary Group: Mr. Bergman, Mr. Stauber, Ms. Tenney, Mr. Finstad, Mr. Langworthy and Mr. Baumgartner.

actions-list.header: Congressional-Executive Commission on the People's Republic of China
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to 22 U.S.C. 6913, and the order of the House of January 3, 2025, the Speaker appointed the following members of the House to the Congressional-Executive Commission on the People's Republic of China: Mrs. Kiggans of Virginia and Mr. Strong.

actions-list.header: Commission on Security and Cooperation in Europe
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to 22 U.S.C. 3003, and the order of the House of January 3, 2025, the Speaker appointed the following members of the House to the Commission on Security and Cooperation in Europe: Mr. Aderholt, Mr. Hudson, Mr. Murphy, Mr. Ellzey, Mr. Cohen, Mr. Cleaver, Mr. Veasey and Mr. Doggett.
The House received a message from the Senate. The Senate passed S. 1003.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Christopher H. Smith to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
